content: This command would convert the SomeApplication.java source file into its equivalent Java byte-code. The resultant byte-code would exist in a newly created file named SomeApplication.class. This process of converting Java source files into their equivalent byte-codes is known as compilation.
stemmed: thi command would convert someapplication.java sourc file equival java byte-cod . the result byte-cod would exist newli creat file name someapplication.class . thi process convert java sourc file equival byte-cod known compil .
